name: Space Girlz
description:
Characters:

Cassey, a joyful  girl who likes apples and speed. She has brown hair.

Lolly, A cute girl who likes lollypops and anime, She has pink hair.

Agatha, a smart girl who likes books and sleep. She has purple hair.

Rebecca, a shy girl who likes onion and crying. She has blue hair.

Johanna, a rude girl who likes horses and guns, She has dark brown hair.

Maggie: a calm girl who likes animals and plants. She has green hair.
